attributes.action: Review BBC NEWS coverage in light of accusations of political bias
attributes.background: The BBC coverage of political matters in the run up to and following the democratic election of the Leader of the Opposition in 2015 has been severely criticised for bias. The BBC, a public service paid for via a licence fee, should be seen to give an unbiased account of the political spectrum

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter with regards to the independence of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
